pasting.name: corrosion treatment
pasting.description: we clean the surface, remove old coatings, and apply special anti-corrosion compounds

pasting.name: lamination of the body
pasting.description: This service helps to preserve the original color and shine of the body, as well as makes car maintenance easier

pasting.name: body painting
pasting.description: Using only high-quality paints and modern technologies, we guarantee perfect coverage, resistance to fading, and durability

pasting.name: painting parts
pasting.description: It allows you to restore or change the color of individual elements of your car, such as bumpers, doors, or hoods

pasting.name: painting discs
pasting.description: We offer painting of both steel and alloy wheels using special paints that provide protection against corrosion and mechanical damage

pasting.name: protective varnish
pasting.description: The protective varnish creates a strong barrier, protecting the car from chemicals and mechanical damage

detailing.name: headlight polishing
detailing.description: special formulations and tools to restore the headlights to their original appearance, improving visibility on the road

detailing.name: body polishing
detailing.description: We use high-quality polishing pastes and equipment to restore the car's charming shine and depth of color

detailing.name: ceramic coating
detailing.description: Applying a ceramic coating protects against chemicals and mechanical damage, and makes it easier to maintain your vehicle

detailing.name: interior dry cleaning
detailing.description: The protective varnish creates a strong barrier, protecting the car from chemicals and mechanical damage

detailing.name: dents removal
detailing.description: Special technologies and tools for carefully removing dents, which allows you to preserve the original coating

detailing.name: protective film
detailing.description: The film forms a durable barrier that preserves the original color and shine of the body, making it easier to maintain the vehicle
